product_name: Oakley Given Sunglasses - Breast Cancer Awareness Edition - Women's
long_description: A classic teardrop shape with a new attitude, the Breast Cancer Awareness Edition of the Oakley Given Sunglasses soar to new heights of style and performance-and giving. With every Breast Cancer Awareness special edition purchase, Oakley will contribute $20 to a non-profit dedicated to young women diagnosed with breast cancer. Polycarbonate lenses block 100% of harmful UV rays and resist impact damage. Given sunglasses feature hot pink and white O detail at the hinge, a ribbon symbol on the lens, and swirls of fuchsia ribbon graphics on the stems. Durable yet comfortably lightweight frame is made of Oakley C-5 metal alloy with acetate earsocks. Exclusive women's eyewear case included.
short_description: A classic teardrop shape with a new attitude, the Breast Cancer Awareness Edition of the Oakley Given Sunglasses soar to new heights of style and performance-and giving.
